fields.original_string:
private static final String TEST_XML_CONTENT = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>"
                                                   + "<book send-by-post=\"true\">"
                                                   + "  <title>Java and XML Data Binding</title>"
                                                   + "  <author>Brett McLaughlin</author>"
                                                   + "  <price currency=\"USD\">34.95</price>"
                                                   + "</book>";
fields.declarator:
TEST_XML_CONTENT = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>"

fields.original_string: private static final byte[] TEST_XML_CONTENT_BYTES = TEST_XML_CONTENT.getBytes();

fields.declarator:
XPATH_EXPR_TO_VALUE = ImmutableMap.of(
            "/book/@send-by-post", "true",
            "/book/title", "Java and XML Data Binding",
            "/book/author", "Brett McLaughlin",
            "/book/price/@currency", "USD",
            "/book/price","34.95")
